title: Low Ink
description: Low ink is a Splatoon tournament that is aimed at newer and lower level competitive teams. Our goal is to give teams a chance to get into the competitive scene and gain experience. High level teams may be barred from playing to preserve our ideology.

title: Swim or Sink
description: Swim or Sink is a midweek tournament series occurring every Wednesday night aimed providing players with competitive practice against other teams on a weekly basis.  The series will track stats so teams can see their progress from week to week, as well as help them establish connections with similarly skilled opponents.

title: Testing Grounds
description: Testing Grounds is a bi-weekly tournament running on Friday nights. The series is aimed to give teams and viewers a platform for finding and testing new ideas for tournament play as well as get more involved with competitive Splatoon

title: The Unnamed Tournament
description: IPL's infrequent tournament where we test things, break things and learn things. It just so happened we made it look professional somehow.

title: Tournament 5
description: IPL's next tournament. Currently a work in progress with more to be announced in the future.
